milestones.title: First Commercial Website
milestones.description: Website for freight forwarding business created using self-taught skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Perl cgi scripts.

milestones.title: First Commercial Web Development Work Experience
milestones.description: In-house LAMP software development using (OO PHP5, JavaScript 1.5, CSS and Linux) for a small IT support company. Work experience placement secured by posting on the mailing list for the Greater London Linux User Group.

milestones.title: Career as Web Development Software Consultant Began
First Lead ReactJS Developer Contract Role
First DevOps Engineer (CI/CD, IAC) Contract Role
GitHub Artic Code Vault Contributor
milestones.description: Three repositories captured belonging to the Open Source Empathy PHP MVC framework project that I began in 2008.

milestones.title: Created website for all docs/resources for the Empathy PHP Framework
milestones.description: I finally began the process of documenting the code in markdown files within respective GitHub repos. There was then a need for a new website to act as a hub for these resources.
